pages.text: jo log ye bahuth bada buhtaan baandh laaye hai, ye bhi tum mein se hee ek gruh hai, tum ise apne liye bura na samjho, balke ye to tumhaare haq mein behtar hai, haan un mein se har ek shaqs par, itna gunaah hai jitna us ne kamaaya hai aur un mein se jis ne us ke bahuth bade hisse ko sar anjaam diya hai, us ke liye azaab bhi bahuth hee bada hai
ose sunte hee momin mardo aur aurto ne apne haq mein nek gumaani kyo na ki aur kyo na keh diya ke ye to khullam khulla sarih buhtaan hai
wo us par chaar gawaah kyo na laaye? aur jab gawaah nahi laaye, to ye buhtaan baaz log yaqinan Allah ke nazdeek mahez jhute hai
agar Allah ta’ala ka fazl wa karam tum par dunya aur aaqirath mein na hota, to yaqinan tum ne jis baath ke char-che shuro kar rakhe thein, us baare mein tumhe bahuth bada azaab pahonchta

jab ke tum ose apni zabaano se naql dar naql karne lage aur apne mu se wo baath nikaalne lage, jis ki tumhe muth-laq qabar na thi, go tum ise halki baath samajhte rahe, lekin Allah ta’ala ke nazdeek wo bahuth badi baath thi
tum ne aisi baath ko sunte hee kyo na keh diya ke hamein aisi baath mu se nikaalni bhi laayeq nahi, ya Allah! tu paak hai, ye to bahuth bada buhtaan hai
Allah ta’ala tumhe nasihath karta hai ke phir kabi bhi aisa kaam na karna agar tum sacche momin ho
Allah ta’ala tumhaare saamne apni aayate bayaan farma raha hai aur Allah ta’ala ilm wa hikmath wala hai
jo log musalmaano mein be hayaayi phailaane ke aarzu mandh rehte hai, un ke liye dunya aur aaqirath mein dardnaak azaab hai, Allah sab kuch jaanta hai aur tum kuch bhi nahi jaante
agar tum par Allah ta’ala ka fazl aur us ki rehmath na hoti aur ye bhi ke Allah ta’ala badi shafaqqath rakhne wala meherbaan hai (to tum par azaab utar jaata)
